replies.msg:
For subjective penalty decisions, such as for a foul or for a handball, the VAR will look to identify a “clear and obvious error”.

The referee will explain his decision to the VAR and what he has seen.

If the evidence provided to the VAR by the broadcast footage does not accord with what the referee believes he has seen, then the VAR can recommend an overturn.

The final decision will remain with the on-field referee.

https://www.premierleague.com/VAR/penalty-decisions-explained

replies.msg: 球員蓄意手球會被罰，但在新例之下，即使是意外手球，若結果導致入球或入球機會出現，球證都要判罰犯規。另外，若果手球位置是在膊頭以上，或球員「不自然」地擴張身體導致手球，都很可能會被判犯規。相反，球員雙手只要貼近自己身體，而且被近距離省中手部則不屬犯規。

replies.msg:
It read: “The Man United skipper’s actions will also be under scrutiny again on Sunday after his penalty area tangle with Jamal Lascelles last weekend. In recent Chelsea meetings the Red Devils’ centre-back has survived VAR reviews of a potential penalty foul on Cesar Azpilicueta and violent challenge on Michy Batshuayi that may well have affected the outcome.”

Solskjaer told Sky Sports: “It’s not right, is it? It’s all these outside influences, even the VAR talk before the game on Harry, that’s cheeky. That’s cheeky when they put that on their website, that’s influencing referees!

“You read about what they say about the controversy about Harry Maguire, putting pressure on referees to give penalties against us.

quote.msg: 球員蓄意手球會被罰，但在新例之下，即使是意外手球，若結果導致入球或入球機會出現，球證都要判罰犯規。另外，若果手球位置是在膊頭以上，或球員「不自然」地擴張身體導致手球，都很可能會被判犯規。相反，球員雙手只要貼近自己身體，而且被近距離省中手部則不屬犯規。

he felt that Hudson-Odoi didn't move his hand towards the ball

第一，呢球係唔係入球或入球機會出現?
第二，球證講左he felt that Hudson-Odoi didn't move his hand towards the ball，而且呢球係被近距離省中手部則不屬犯規，所以不屬犯規

我淨係quote球例一點
the hand/arm is above/beyond their shoulder level
呢球點樣唔係？

同埋球例手球入面已經冇左距離呢個考慮因素

唔係quote左球證覺得佢冇主動打個波就當左自己岩嫁

replies.msg: 呢球左隻手有高過shoulder?
高普話唔比12碼曼聯.

quote.msg:
片>圖
屈唔到
前一球罰球都唔應該吹啦

replies.msg: 屌你老味 追返去創會嗰日丫笨

quote.msg: It's a waste of time asking us because the rules change every week. I don't think it was a penalty

replies.msg:
There is also room for interpretation as to what makes a player's body 'unnaturally bigger'.

So, if a player has his arms by their side when the ball hits their hand/arm, they may not automatically concede a penalty.
